item.title: Gran Canaria’s Broken Bird Games Breaks Out With Psychological Horror Video Game ‘Luto’
item.description: With “Luto,” Gran Canaria’s Broken Bird Games has pulled off a rare feat for an indie, punching above its weight in an oversupplied global games market. Visually rich and narratively ambitious,
